email.subject: SPARTAN effort on AI agents - Postdoc Position

body_text: Applications are invited for a postdoctoral research fellow position at the National University of Singapore (NUS).
The position will focus on agentic AI approaches towards software engineering.
The group at NUS has research expertise in program repair, fuzzing and symbolic execution, and details of the research group hosting the postdoc can be found from https://nus-tss.github.io/

For this specific position, we are building on our recent work on AutoCodeRover, an early agent for software engineering, which has since been acquired as a spinoff, and the effort is being continued for usage, deployment and continued learning from the efforts.
The post-doc candidate will thus join our SPARTAN effort on agents at NUS https://spartan-nus.github.io/
NUS is a leading comprehensive university in Asia providing ample opportunities and environment for career growth.
Only candidates who have submitted PhD thesis or will be submitting soon can be considered.
Interested candidates can email their CV and sample publications to [log in to unmask].

footer.note: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to mailto:[log in to unmask]
footer.more_info: http://sigsoft.org/resources/seworld.html provides more information on SEWORLD as well as links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
